page.title: 04EMPLOYMENT
page.content: {On the Land}Farmers (self employed) and farm workers plus some casual labour including flower pickers in the season. {Fishing}for mackerel,plaice,monkfish, cod,sole,etc.Some sold locally and some at Newlyn fish market. {Boat Hire}St.Anthony-20 boats for hire and some 60 privately owned.The boatyard employs 4 in winter and 10 in summer.Also boatyard at Helford. {Other Occupations}Large model cars made at Gillan Garage plus car and boat repairs-employs 3.Agricultural and marine engineers at Manaccan,also garage.Shopkeepers,publicans,holiday cottage agents,carpenter,builders,postmen, market gardener,knitting and naval personnel (Culdrose).Riding stables at Gillan.
